channel.title: Management on Jens Rantil
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Jens Rantil

item.title: A one-on-one template
item.description:
I have used the same one-on-one template with my last six managers, including other regular check-ins. I am very happy with it! A recent conversation with a friend made me realize I better share the template with the world. If nothing else, I should share it for my own sake - in case I need it again in the future.

The template has given me a lot of structure to my one-on-ones which I previously never had. It has also guided my one-on-ones toward more actionable meetings, focusing on what needs to happen next.
